summary.span: 表示一个可以存储多个数据对象的容器。

span.span: Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，可用于将对象组织成单个实体的可移植性和高效地访问定义的物理格式。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 文件是用于主的物理格式。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他实现可能使用其他物理格式，如 XML 文档，一个数据库，或 Web 服务。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 与文件系统，类似的项包含在文件夹和文件的分层组织中的引用。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 尽管本身是一个抽象类，派生的类用作默认方法。Although itself is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. A （"部件"） 是抽象类，表示存储在一个对象。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . A （"关系"） 定义源之间的关联或和目标对象。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. A可以是两个类型之一，其中每个可以是两种形式之一：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 包级别关系 (由方法) 相关为：A package-level relationship (created by the method) relates a to either: - 包中的目标部件中。A target part in the package. - 外部包的目标资源。A target resource outside the package. - 部分级关系 (由方法) 相关源为：A part-level relationship (created by the method) relates a source to either: - 包中的另一个目标部件。Another target part in the package. - 外部包的目标资源。A target resource outside the package. 关系的源或源被视为关系的"所有者"。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 当删除源对象时，还删除源对象拥有的所有关系。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改以任何方式的源或目标对象。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. A （"数字签名"） 是复合，这些部件和关系表示数字签名附带。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 数字签名标识发起方，并验证已签名的部件和关系，包含在尚未修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 包还支持数字权限管理 (DRM)，这样中的内容元素进行加密的特定访问权限授予给授权用户。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM) which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 基于体系结构，是一种包类型设计用来存储基于打开的文档[XML 纸张规范 (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). .NET Framework 使用包来存储内容、 资源和关系的页和默认情况下使用标准的 ZIP 文件的文档。The .NET Framework uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 与任何 ZIP 文件一样，你的应用程序可以使用类来存储和 （可选） 保护的任何类型或单个高效访问容器中的数据文件数。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 有关详细信息，请参阅下载开放式打包约定 (OPC) 规范[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建的基本步骤。The following example shows the basic steps for creating a . 在此示例中，创建一个包以包含文档和文档的一部分显示图形图像。In this example, a package is created to contain a document together with a graphic image that is displayed as part of the document. (这是类似于在其中某一 HTML 文件具有这种情况\ 引用外部图像文件的标记。)两个元素还包括包中。(This is similar to the case in which an HTML file has an \ tag that references an external image file.) Two elements are also included in the package. 第一个"包级别"关系中，定义作为包的根元素的文档部分。The first, a "package-level" relationship, defines the document part as the package's root element. 第二个、"一部分的级别"的关系定义的文档部分 （"源"的部分级关系） 和其使用的图像部分 （"目标"的部分级关系） 之间的关联。A second, "part-level" relationship defines the association between the document part (the "source" of the part-level relationship) and its use of the image part (the "target" of the part-level relationship). 有关完整的示例，请参阅[写入包的示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生方法由调用方法创建部件基于派生类中实现的物理格式。The derived method is called by the method to create a part based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. 默认情况下，派生的抽象类实现提供和使用类。By default, a derived class implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. 在默认操作中，内部调用的类以 ZIP 文件中创建新的部件。In the default operation, internally calls of the class to create a new part in a ZIP file. 默认值为派生类，方法仅支持两个`compressionOption`值，或压缩。For the default derived class, the method only supports two `compressionOption` values, or compression. 其他值， ，或使用压缩。Other values of , , or use compression. 有关包模型和包部件的详细信息，请参阅下载的开放式打包约定 (OPC) 规范的第 1 章[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about the package model and package parts, see Chapter 1 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

para.span: 派生实现应作出有关顺序或所执行的操作没有假设调用它的方法。

span.span: The derived implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the method that calls it.

summary.span: 创建与给定的部件的包级别关系。

span.span: Creates a package-level relationship to a given part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包级别关系定义包和相关联的目标一部分或资源之间的关联。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 包级别关系可以是两种形式之一。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 之间到目标包内。Between a to a target inside the package. - 之间到包外部的目标资源。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 在包关系包被视为关系"所有者"。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 当删除包时，还删除归包的所有关系。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部分或以任何方式的资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 有关其他信息，请参阅下载开放式打包约定 (OPC) 规范[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For additional information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建之间和根文档部分。The following example illustrates creating a between a and a root document part. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[写入包的示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). summary.span: 返回所有包级别关系的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the package-level relationships.

returns.span: 包中包含的所有包级别关系的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the package-level relationships that are contained in the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将永远不会返回`null`; 但是，如果包中不包含任何包级别关系，则返回的集合可能包含零个元素。 will never return `null`; however the returned collection may contain zero elements if the package contains no package-level relationships. 包级别关系定义包和相关联的目标一部分或资源之间的关联。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 包级别关系可以是两种形式之一。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 之间到包中的目标部件。Between a to a target part in the package. - 之间到包外部的目标资源。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 在包关系包被视为关系"所有者"。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 当删除包时，还删除归包的所有关系。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部分或以任何方式的资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 有关打包和包关系的其他信息，请参阅部分 1.3 可供下载的开放式打包约定 (OPC) 规范[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For additional information about packaging and package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

exception.span: 包未打开（已调用了 或 ）。

The package is write-only.
